Entries.winter_1_1: Hi @!^I just wanted to let you know my niece comes to Stardew Valley every winter with her Hot Cocoa Shop! Mary Ann will be selling hot cocoa, cocoa powder, cookies, and some more desserts in the back of the saloon all winter. I cleared out the storage room just for her. And I've got some speciality hot cocoa recipes for you to buy at the bar!^ - Gus

Entries.Saloon_29_8: Usually, my parents don't get me. But how could I turn down hot cocoa?
Entries.Saloon_30_9: It was my idea to head back here for hot cocoa. Watching the boys play pool is cool and all, but it's nice to just talk to each other for once.
